body_html:
Perhaps use Let's Encrypt? Free and wildcarded.

Edit: apparently full wildcard support is not available until the end of February; regardless, their existing certificate can be issued for base.domain + www.base.domain which satisfies this case. It's also very simple to get running - certbot will do everything for you.
body_text:
Perhaps use Let's Encrypt? Free and wildcarded.
Edit: apparently full wildcard support is not available until the end of February; regardless, their existing certificate can be issued for base.domain + www.base.domain which satisfies this case. It's also very simple to get running - certbot will do everything for you.
body:
Perhaps use [Let's Encrypt](https://letsencrypt.org/)? Free and wildcarded.

Edit: apparently full wildcard support is not available until the end of February; regardless, their existing certificate can be issued for base.domain + www.base.domain which satisfies this case. It's also very simple to get running - [certbot](https://certbot.eff.org/) will do everything for you.
